devdoc.author: Rodrigo Gmez Gentil, Antonio Cruz Surez

__callback(bytes32,string,bytes).details: Get the querys using the parameter myid

params.risk: risk/choice chosen by player. The higher the risk, the more profitable if winning

fundGame().details: It's just the same as fallback function.

getRoundInfo(uint256).details: This function is implemented mainly for debugging purpose. Actually getting info from front-end is managed through events.

params.roundId: round id number that identify a round

getRoundInfo(uint256).return: player1Address address of player1player1Choice secret choice of player1betAmount amount of the bet of this round, in wei.winner address of the winner, it's 0x0 if not finished or drawif round is closed

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setLotteryRate(uint256).details: Mostly for testing porpuse. It should be removed in final deployment or no modifiable by anyone

setminBusinessFeePayment(uint256).details: Mostly for testing porpuse. It should be removed in final deployment or no modifiable by anyone

params.newMinBusinessFeePayment: new min amount of ETH to transfer to business

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Dice game, playing also for a jackpot.

__callback(bytes32,string,bytes).notice: Callback function to emit the events with the information we want.

calculateProfit(uint256,uint256).notice: Function for calculate the profit if winning in dice game.

fundGame().notice: Payable, to fund game by adding ethers to contract and to the jackpot

playSoloRound(uint256).notice: Function to create a round playing against the blockchain.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setLotteryRate(uint256).notice: Set the lottery rate in percentage, how easy is to hit the jackpot

setminBusinessFeePayment(uint256).notice: Set the minimum amount of ETH to be transfered when collecting business fees

startGame().notice: When we have everything ready owner can start game so anyone can play. Also for restarting game after having stopped it Call parent function and start lottery as well

startLottery().notice: Start lottery (this means playing for jackpot)

stopGame().notice: Function for emergengies. Call parent function and stop lottery as well

stopLottery().notice: Stop lottery (this means stop playing for jackpot)

withdrawFunds(address).notice: Withdraw funds in case of an emergengy. Set jackpot to 0.

userdoc.notice: This is just a simple game for the TFM of the Master in Ethereum. Do not use betting real value since it may have some vulnerabilities. Further analysis and assurance is needed to take in production/main net.
